trans-unit.source: when green flag clicked ask [Enter the year and I will tell you if it's a leap year or not:] and wait set [year v] to (answer) if <not <((year) mod (4)) = [0]>> then say (join (year) [ is not a leap year!]) else if <not <((year) mod (100)) = [0]>> then say (join (year) [ is a leap year!]) else if <not <((year) mod (400)) = [0]>> then say (join (year) [ is not a leap year!]) else say (join (year) [ is a leap year!]) end end end
